page.title: 08GRANGE FARM-EAST SLEEKBURN
page.content:
The following report was written by {Johnny Liu,Lee Mack,Martyn Pegg and {Anthony Johnson.}
Sleekburn Grange Farm is owned by{Mr. {J.M. Binnie.}It is a mixed farm of about 400 acres.His main product is barley and he feeds fat cattle and sheep for milk and meat.The farm is very well drained therefore the crops can grow easily.The farms main disadvantage is that it is near houses and suffers from vandalism and disturbance.Nearness to farming markets is an advantage and Mr Binnie sells most of his produce to grain merchants and wholesale butchers.It is a very economical farm and three people are employed there.Every year the farm is used as a base for the {East Sleekburn Village Fete. } { }
